author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a new scenario with the V9 geometry of HGCal and T14 geometry of the tracker. This is similar to the D41 scenario except that HGCal resembles the TDR design. The corresponding workflow is created at 29834.0

#### PR validation:

Tested using the workflow 29838.0

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

To be used for testing the impact of HGCal design on muon chambers. No backport is needed
title: Phase2-hgx200 Add a new Phase2 scenario D43
